subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Jim Ferry, who led Long Island University to consecutive appearances in the N.C.A.A. tournament, is the new head men’s basketball coach at Duquesne.
snippet: Jim Ferry, who led Long Island University to consecutive appearances in the N.C.A.A. tournament, is the new head men’s basketball coach at Duquesne.
